divs: Sighting DetailsDriving North or West on the 138 with a friend, Ed Williams - retired Air Force, I saw a bright light in the sky. After watching it a moment or so, I could tell it was somewhat triangular in shape or appeareance. I then asked Ed if he could see it. When he finally cought a glimpse of what I was looking at, we pulled over. It looked as though it was over Edwards Air Force base from the angle and direction we were looking in. Anyway, not much later, there were suddenly 3 of them. They formed a triangle out of the 3 lights and then, faster than I could really register what was going on, lights of every color I've ever seen, and then some came flashing out of all 3 things. Then, they were simply gone! I was fascinated because, around 1977, in Mojave, 3 friends of mine and I saw almost the exact same phenomenon.
